Title: Requires every case of an injury arising from or caused by a bicycle with electric assist, an electric scooter or limited use motorcycle to be reported at once to the police authorities
Summary: Requires every case of an injury arising from or caused by a bicycle with electric assist, an electric scooter or limited use motorcycle to be reported at once to the police authorities of the city, town or village where the person reporting is located; provides that the failure to report shall be a class A misdemeanor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring every case of an injury arising from or caused by a bicycle with electric assist, an electric scooter or a limited use motorcycle to be reported at once to the police authorities of the city, town or village where the person reporting is located
